mapper.insert: INSERT INTO password_reset_token_tb (user_id, token, expires_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{token}, #{expiresAt})
mapper.select: SELECT token_id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at FROM password_reset_token_tb WHERE token = #{token} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM password_reset_token_tb WHERE expires_at < NOW()
